errors.error_description: Specified outdated Python version range (3.5-3.8) and pinned to old pyftpdlib version (1.5.0) which may not be compatible with modern systems
correction_candidates:
pyftpdlib requires Python 3.6 or later. Install using:

$ pip install pyftpdlib

pyftpdlib supports Python 3.x. Install the latest version using:

$ pip install pyftpdlib

pyftpdlib requires Python 3.7+ for optimal compatibility. Install using:

$ pip install pyftpdlib

Install the latest pyftpdlib version using:

$ pip install pyftpdlib
errors.golden_answer:
pyftpdlib requires Python 3.6 or later. Install using:

$ pip install pyftpdlib

errors.error_description: Used python2 command which is incompatible with pyftpdlib that requires Python 3
